Description:
Overview:We are a leading IT service provider in Kuwait, specializing in the diagnostics, repair, and maintenance of a wide range of electronic devices. We are seeking a dedicated Electronics Technician with expertise in computer motherboard repairs to join our dynamic team.Key Responsibilities:Diagnose and identify faults in computer motherboards and related hardware components.
Perform intricate soldering tasks to replace or repair damaged components.
Use rebelling techniques to restore the quality and functionality of BGA components on motherboards.
Utilize heat guns and other required tools effectively and safely to perform repairs.
Test and verify the functionality of repaired motherboards and components.
Maintain a detailed record of all repairs and components used.
Collaborate with the IT team to understand and rectify software and firmware-related issues, if any.
Ensure all repairs are done in accordance with company standards and protocols.
Stay updated with the latest techniques, tools, and components related to motherboard repair.
Provide guidance and support to junior technicians and interns.Skills
Skills: Applicants must have a transferable visa to work in Kuwait.

Diploma or degree in Electronics, Computer Hardware, or a related field.
Minimum of 5 years of hands-on experience in computer motherboard repair.
Proficiency in soldering, rebelling, and the use of heat guns.
Solid understanding of electronic circuits, components, and schematics.
Familiarity with the latest tools and techniques in the field of electronics repair.
Basic IT skills to manage software and firmware-related tasks.
Strong troubleshooting and problem-solving abilities.

Detail-oriented and precision-focused.
Strong communication and interpersonal skills.
Ability to work both independently and as part of a team.
Commitment to maintaining high-quality service standards.
Eagerness to learn and adapt to changing technologies.

Data.Company Industry: IT Services; Computer Hardware & High-Tech Manufacture
